name: @jewelry-seo/security
description: Security testing framework for jewelry SEO automation platform

scripts.test:sql: npm run build && node dist/security-runner.js sql
scripts.test:xss: npm run build && node dist/security-runner.js xss
scripts.test:auth: npm run build && node dist/security-runner.js auth
scripts.test:input: npm run build && node dist/security-runner.js input
scripts.test:rate: npm run build && node dist/security-runner.js rate
scripts.test:data: npm run build && node dist/security-runner.js data
scripts.test:headers: npm run build && node dist/security-runner.js headers
